revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Open-source Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.orangepi.org/html/hardWare/computerAndMicrocontrollers/details/orange-pi-3-LTS.html |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Orange Pi |model = OPI 3 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = LTS |revision = V1.4 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/29/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Orange_Pi_3_LTS |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2AQ9Y-OPI3LTS |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H6; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H9CCNNNBJTAL-ARNVD; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Motorcomm;YT8531C; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0a |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, HDMI 2.0a, Bluetooth 5.0, IR receiver, Audio/CVBS, Microphone, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO |addchip = PMIC for Multi-Core High Performance System;X-Powers;AXP805;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;3;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089;;1;,,, ESD Protection Array for I/O Port;Amazing Micro;AZ1045-04F;;5;,,, 350mA, 3.3V High Speed LDO Regulator;MicrOne;ME6212;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Shenzhen Xunlong |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu 22.04, Debian, Android 9, Armbian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/31/2022 |estreldate = 12/2021 |estprice = 35 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09TQZH4GJ |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = CDTech CDW 20U5622 <!-- SPRD UWE5622 --> |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = Unisoc<!-- Allwinner -->;UWE5622 <!-- AW859A -->; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''OrangePi'' logo, "3 LTS" and "V1.4" are on top of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H6 Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) :GPU: ''Mali-T720 MP2'' @600MHz *Storage: 8GB (eMMC 5.1) Flash, :TF card (max.64GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (SDRAM) LPDDR3 (shared w/ GPU) *Wi-Fi: [[Unisoc]] UWE5622 (1T1R) :802.11abgn/ac + BT 5.0 *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C)
==Links of Interest== *[http://www.orangepi.org/orangepiwiki/index.php/Orange_Pi_3_LTS ''Orange Pi 3 LTS'' on '''OrangePi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/12/24/orange-pi-3-lts-sbc-2gb-ram-8gb-flash-aw859a-wifi-5-and-bluetooth-5-0-module/ ''$35 Orange Pi 3 LTS SBC'' on '''CNX-Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/orange-pi-3-slims-down-in-new-lts-version/ ''Orange Pi 3 slims down in new LTS version'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
